mapper.select: SELECT id_mechanic as idMechanic, location as location, shop_name as shopName, stars as stars, shop_phone_number as shopPhoneNumber FROM mechanic WHERE status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE mechanic SET verification_path=#{verificationPath} WHERE id_mechanic=#{idMechanic} and status = 1
mapper.select: SELECT stars_count as starsCount, stars as stars FROM mechanic WHERE id_mechanic = #{idMechanic} and status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE mechanic SET stars = (#{stars}+stars*stars_count)/(stars_count+1), stars_count = stars_count+1 WHERE id_mechanic = #{idMechanic} and status = 1
mapper.select: SELECT a.id_seller as idSeller, a.id_city as idCity, a.location as location, a.shop_name as shopName, a.shop_phone_number as shopPhoneNumber, COUNT(b.id_star) as stars, round(AVG(b.score),0) as starsCount, a.verification_path as verificationPath FROM mechanic a, star b WHERE a.id_seller = #{sellerId} and a.id_mechanic = b.id_mechanic and a.status = 1 GROUP BY a.id_mechanic
